an3.125:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati gotamake cetiye.
an3.125:2.2: Sanidānāhaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammaṁ desemi, no anidānaṁ.
an3.125:2.3: Sappāṭihāriyāhaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammaṁ desemi, no appāṭihāriyaṁ.
an3.125:2.4: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhave, abhiññāya dhammaṁ desayato no anabhiññāya, sanidānaṁ dhammaṁ desayato no anidānaṁ, sappāṭihāriyaṁ dhammaṁ desayato no appāṭihāriyaṁ, karaṇīyo ovādo, karaṇīyā anusāsanī.
an3.125:2.5: Alañca pana vo, bhikkhave, tuṭṭhiyā, alaṁ attamanatāya, alaṁ somanassāya:
an3.125:3.2: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
an3.125:3.3: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṁ bhaññamāne sahassī lokadhātu akampitthāti.
